meta.label: Compute statistics from list of edges
meta.description: This recipe creates a graph from a list of edges and computes various statistics.

params.name: eigenvector_centrality
params.label: Compute eigenvector centrality
params.description: Eigenvector centrality computes the centrality for a node based on the centrality of its neighbors.

params.name: clustering
params.label: Compute clustering coefficient
params.description: For unweighted graphs, the clustering of a node u is the fraction of possible triangles through that node that exist.

params.name: triangles
params.label: Compute count of triangles
params.description: Finds the number of triangles that include a node as one vertex.

params.name: closeness
params.label: Compute closeness centrality
params.description: Closeness centrality of a node u is the reciprocal of the sum of the shortest path distances from u to all n-1 other nodes.

params.name: pagerank
params.label: Compute pagerank
params.description: PageRank computes a ranking of the nodes in the graph G based on the structure of the incoming links.

params.name: sq_clustering
params.label: Compute square clustering
params.description: Compute the squares clustering coefficient for nodes.
